#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#define MAX 100000
using namespace std;

long int seq[MAX+5];

long long int value_of_seq(long int n)
{
        long int i,j;long long int value=0;
        if(!n) return 0;
        j=seq[0]=n/2;seq[n-1]=j+1;j+=2;
        for(i=1;i<n-1;i+=2,j++) {seq[i]=j;value+=j;}
        for(i=2,j=1;i<n-1;i+=2,j++) {seq[i]=j;value-=j;}
        value=(value<<1)-seq[0];
        if(n==1) return 0;
        if(n&1) return value-seq[n-1];
        else return value+seq[n-1];
}

int main() {

		int t;long int i,n;long long int value;
		scanf("%i",&t);
		while(t--)
		{
	        scanf("%ld",&n);
	        value=value_of_seq(n);
	        printf("%lld",value);
	        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	            printf(" %ld",seq[i]);
	        printf("\n");     
		}
    return 0;
}
